description: [SLOWPULSE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1104) can log credentials on compromised Pulse Secure VPNs during the `DSAuth::AceAuthServer::checkUsernamePassword`ACE-2FA authentication procedure.(Citation: Mandiant Pulse Secure Zero-Day April 2021)

external_references.description: Perez, D. et al. (2021, April 20). Check Your Pulse: Suspected APT Actors Leverage Authentication Bypass Techniques and Pulse Secure Zero-Day. Retrieved February 5, 2024.
